version_description: Thanks for using Pages Manager! To make the app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Every update of our app includes improvements for speed and reliability. As other new features become available, we will highlight those for you in the app.

We're excited to introduce Facebook Business Suite with this new update, an easier way to manage your business across Facebook and Instagram, simplified and in one place. With this update, you'll see:
Once you're on Business Suite, you'll be able to post, manage messages and comments, advertise, and view insights across both Facebook and Instagram from a single app
You'll have the option to switch between Business Suite and the Pages Manager App experience

We're excited to introduce Facebook Business Suite with this new update, an easier way to manage your business across Facebook and Instagram, simplified and in one place. With this update, you'll see:
Once you're on Business Suite, you'll be able to post, manage messages and comments, advertise, and view insights across both Facebook and Instagram from a single app
You'll have the option to switch between Business Suite and the Pages Manager App experience

You'll have the option to switch between Business Suite and the Pages Manager App experience

You'll have the option to switch between Business Suite and the Pages Manager App experience

What's new:
Now, you can see and manage how your business' Facebook and Instagram profiles show up to your customers, directly from the Business Suite app. Update your business' profile photos and edit your profile information from a single place, so your customers are always kept up-to-date!
